etymology.description: Phonetic: 虍(虍) (hū) + Semantic: 皿(皿) (mǐn, "vessel") = container or vessel with dark coloring -> black
etymology.interpretation: The character 盧(盧) (lú, "black") combines an element suggesting a container with 虍(虍) (hū), often related to pigmentation. The use of 皿(皿) (mǐn, "vessel") here suggests a vessel with dark coloring, aligning with the definition as black.

examples.chinese: 他穿着盧色的外套(他穿著盧色的外套)，在冬日显得格外温暖(在冬日顯得格外溫暖)。
examples.pinyin: Tā chuānzhuó lú sè de wàitào, zài dōngrì xiǎnde géwài wēnnuǎn.
examples.english: He is wearing a black coat, making him look exceptionally warm in winter.

examples.chinese: 夜空挂满盧云(夜空掛滿盧雲)，仿佛一幅古画(仿佛一幅古畫)。
examples.pinyin: Yèkōng guà mǎn lú yún, fǎngfú yī fú gǔhuà.
examples.english: The night sky is filled with black clouds, resembling an ancient painting.
